Mary Scholastica Scholl

  1. Foster Name: Mary
  2. Foster Family: John and Eugenia Laible
  3. Location of Family: Stuart, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Stuart, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1911-02-05, New York City, NY
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Mary C. Buscher
  10. Spouse Name: Mark J. Buscher
  11. Source: Holt County Historical Society List of Children; Crossroads vol. 20, 1992, p. 15; Patricia J. Young, and Frances E. Marks. Tears on Paper: The History and Life Stories of the Orphan Train Riders (n.p., 1990), p. 157-164; Lincoln Star, 26 August 1987; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 2 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 141-145; "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; National Orphan Train Complex; 1930 United States Federal Census.
